reviews.review_msg: Her lectures are her simply reading quotes from a powerpoint that come directly from the readings, with no teaching of her own. Boring class, and no need to attend, just read the powerpoints online.

A very kind lady with some organizational issues.  Lecture consisted of quotes on a powerpoint from the reading in no particular order, works of art related to those quotes quickly flashed on the screen and a whole lot of technical difficulties that took up class time.  Overall, difficult to stay awake in such a boring, chaotically structured class
